name: Leonine Info Solutions
description:
Leonine Info Solutions is a full-service web design/development, mobiel apps, and digital marketing agency. We help our customers to utilize the power of the Internet to get more business and strengthen their branding. Established in 2012, we have more than 100 active customers on 3 continents in 5 countries.
Our core area of focus includes web design, web development, mobile applications, search engine optimization, search engine marketing, social media management, resource outsourcing services to our clients and partners.
